_comments._overview: Content configuration system - controls how content is displayed across the application, particularly homepage sections and content filtering
_comments._runtime_usage: Loaded by src/lib/content-config.ts and src/hooks/useContentConfig.ts; JSON must remain valid. Keys should match defined unions: sections ∈ {courses, documents, videos}; price filters ∈ {all, free, paid}; sort ∈ {newest, oldest, price-low, price-high, popular}.
_comments.homepage: Homepage content section configuration - controls which content types appear, their order, filtering, and display settings
_comments.homepage.sections: Configuration for each content type section (courses, documents, videos) on the homepage
_comments.homepage.sections.enabled: Boolean to show/hide the entire section on homepage. If false, section is completely removed.
_comments.homepage.sections.title: Section heading text displayed above the content carousel
_comments.homepage.sections.description: Section description text displayed below the title
_comments.homepage.sections.filters: Content filtering configuration to control what items appear in the section
_comments.homepage.sections.filters.priceFilter: Filter by price: 'all' (free + paid), 'free' (only free content), 'paid' (only premium content)
_comments.homepage.sections.filters.categories: Array of category strings to filter by. Must match entries in global.categories; empty [] shows all.
_comments.homepage.sections.filters.maxItems: Maximum number of items to display in the section carousel (positive integer).
_comments.homepage.sections.filters.sortBy: Sort order: 'newest' (creation date desc), 'oldest' (creation date asc), 'price-low', 'price-high', 'popular' (enrollments+views)
_comments.homepage.sections.carousel: Responsive carousel display configuration for the content section
_comments.homepage.sections.carousel.itemsPerView: Number of items visible at each screen size breakpoint
_comments.homepage.sections.carousel.autoplay: Boolean - whether carousel automatically advances to next item
_comments.homepage.sections.carousel.loop: Boolean - whether carousel loops back to beginning when reaching the end
_comments.homepage.sectionOrder: Array defining the order sections appear on homepage. Only enabled sections will be rendered; unrecognized keys are ignored.
_comments.contentPage: Content library page configuration - controls filtering, pagination, and search features
_comments.contentPage.filters: Content page filtering and display options
_comments.contentPage.filters.defaultView: Default view mode: 'grid' (card layout) or 'list' (row layout).
_comments.contentPage.filters.itemsPerPage: Number of items to show per page for pagination (positive integer).
_comments.contentPage.filters.enableSearch: Boolean - show/hide search input for filtering content by title/description
_comments.contentPage.filters.enableFilters: Boolean - show/hide category and price filter controls
_comments.contentPage.filters.enableSorting: Boolean - show/hide sort dropdown for ordering results
_comments.global: Global configuration shared across the application
_comments.global.categories: Master list of available content categories (strings). Must match content item 'category' values.
_comments.global.priceFilterOptions: Labels for price filter dropdown options. Keys must be 'all', 'free', 'paid'.
_comments.global.sortOptions: Labels for sort dropdown options. Keys must be 'newest', 'oldest', 'price-low', 'price-high', 'popular'.
